features.name: Session Guard
features.description: Prevents launching Claude Code within existing sessions

features.name: Agent Teams Fix
features.description: Corrected model identifiers for cloud providers

features.name: MCP Tool Stability
features.description: Fixed crashes with image content streaming

features.name: Session Preview
features.description: Readable command names in resume previews

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Better error messages with fallback suggestions

releaseHighlight: Enhanced session management and terminal performance with improved error handling across cloud platforms
sourceContent: - Added guard against launching Claude Code inside another Claude Code session - Fixed Agent Teams using wrong model identifier for Bedrock, Vertex, and Foundry customers - Fixed a crash when MCP tools return image content during streaming - Fixed /resume session previews showing raw XML tags instead of readable command names - Improved model error messages for Bedrock/Vertex/Foundry users with fallback suggestions - Improved terminal rendering performance - Fixed fatal errors being swallowed instead of displayed - Fixed process hanging after session close - Fixed character loss at terminal screen boundary - Fixed blank lines in verbose transcript view
